name: Dynamic System Status Checker
description: Detects system status including drive type, TPM status, AD status, and computer name. Configurable via JSON.

steps.name: Detect TPM Status
steps.command: if ls /dev/tpm* 1>/dev/null 2>&1; then ls /dev/tpm*; tpm2_getcap properties-fixed 2>/dev/null | grep -i TPM2_PT_MANUFACTURER || echo 'TPM manufacturer info unavailable'; else echo 'No TPM device found'; fi

steps.name: Detect AD Status
steps.command: systemctl status sssd | grep 'sssd_be' | grep -oP '(?<=--domain )[^ ]+' || echo 'Not joined to AD'
